mapper.update: UPDATE pharmacy set status=#{status}, tx_id=#{transaction.txId}, tx_host=#{transaction.txHost}, tx_user_id=#{transaction.txUserId}, tx_date=#{transaction.txDate} WHERE pharmacy_id=#{pharmacyId} and status=1

UPDATE pharmacy set name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, tx_id=#{transaction.txId}, tx_host=#{transaction.txHost}, tx_user_id=#{transaction.txUserId}, tx_date=#{transaction.txDate} WHERE pharmacy_id=#{pharmacyId} and status=1
mapper.select: select pharmacy_id as pharmacyId, name as name, phone as phone, email as email, status as status from pharmacy
SELECT pharmacy_id as pharmacyId, name as name, phone as phone, email as email FROM pharmacy WHERE pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId} and status = 1
select bank_account_id as bankAccountId, account_number as accountNumber from bank_account where pharmacy_id=#{pharmacyId} and status = 1
select subsidiary_id as subsidiaryId, subsidiary_name as subsidiaryName from subsidiary where pharmacy_id=#{pharmacyId} and status = 1

select a.pharmacy_id as roleUserId, b.subsidiary_name as subsidiaryName, c.first_name as firstName, c.first_surname as firstSurname, c.second_surname as secondSurname, c.ci as ci from pharmacy_admin a, subsidiary b, person c, pharmacy d where d.pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId} and d.pharmacy_id = b.pharmacy_id and b.subsidiary_id = a.subsidiary_id and a.person_id = c.person_id and a.status = 1
